=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hobbit, The: The Battle of the Five Armies (3D Blu-ray + Blu-ray)
Review Date: 2015/04/21
Store: Ian McKellen  (Actor),     Martin Freeman  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray
Product Description: ['Hobbit, The: The Battle of the Five Armies (3D Blu-ray + Blu-ray)', 'THORIN OAKENSHIELD AND THE DWARVES OF EREBOR have reclaimed the vast wealth of their homeland, but now face the consequences of having unleashed the terrifying Dragon Smaug upon Lake-town. Meanwhile, Sauron, the Dark Lord, has sent forth legions of Orcs to attack the Lonely Mountain, and Bilbo Baggins fi nds himself fi ghting for his life as fi ve great armies go to war. As darkness converges, the races of Dwarves, Elves and Men must decide – unite or be destroyed.', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.8

reference_summary:
Inglourious Basterds [Blu-ray] Brad Pitt (Actor), Mike Myers (Actor), Quentin Tarantino (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure ['Brad Pitt takes no prisoners in Quentin Tarantino’s high-octane WWII revenge fantasy Inglourious Basterds. As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as “The Basterds,” is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich. Bursting with “action, hair-trigger suspense and a machine-gun spray of killer dialogue” (Peter Travers, Rolling Stone), Inglourious Basterds is “another Tarantino masterpiece” (Jake Hamilton, CBS-TV)!'] {'Genre': 'Le commando des batards, DVD Movie, Inglorious Bastards, Military & War, Blu-ray Movie, Quentin Tarantino, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Action & AdventureLe commando des batards, DVD Movie, Inglorious Bastards, Military & War, Blu-ray Movie, Quentin Tarantino, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Action & Adventure See more', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copyMultiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copy See more', 'Contributor': 'Hilmar Eichhorn, Ludger Pistor, Richard Sammel, Rod Taylor, Sylvester Groth, Til Schweiger, Enzo G. Castellari, Gedeon Burkhard, Christian Berkel, André Penvern, Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Bo Svenson, Michael Bacall, Buddy Joe Hooker, Quentin Tarantino, Cristoph Waltz,… See more', 'Language': 'French (DTS 5.1), English (DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1), Spanish (DTS 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 33 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.75 x 5.3 x 0.45 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Quentin Tarantino', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copy', 'Run time': '2 hours and 33 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 15, 2009', 'Actors': 'Brad Pitt, Mike Myers, Cristoph Waltz, Michael Bacall, Bo Svenson', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} The movie was great but, my Blu-Ray player would play everything on the disk except the movie. From from what I read on the internet no movies by universal will play on this Blu-Ray player because Phillips won't update the firmware. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user enjoys action and adventure films, particularly those with high levels of suspense and intense storytelling. They also have a strong interest in science fiction and fantasy, especially narratives that incorporate contemporary technological themes.
- **Director Affinity:** They appreciate acclaimed filmmakers, with a notable fondness for Quentin Tarantino and Peter Jackson, reflecting a preference for unique storytelling and immersive worlds.
- **Actor Favoritism:** The user enjoys films featuring prominent and charismatic actors, with recent highlights of Johnny Depp, Paul Bettany, Ian McKellen, and Martin Freeman, indicating a broad attraction to compelling performances.
- **Format Preference:** They favor Blu-ray and 3D formats, showing a desire for high-quality video and audio experiences, particularly in immersive cinematic presentations.
- **Technical Awareness:** The user is technically aware and concerned about playback issues, valuing seamless media experiences and likely investing in compatible technologies to enhance their viewing enjoyment.
- **Mixed Experience:** While the user enjoys the films they watch, they are also mindful of technical challenges faced in the past. Their recent interactions highlight a continued appreciation for renowned franchises that emphasize quality storytelling and visual engagement.

Overall, the user profile reflects a deep appreciation for quality cinematic experiences across action, fantasy, and science fiction genres, coupled with a keen interest in celebrated filmmakers and stellar performances.
